abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Provincial and
            Peri-Urban Water and Sanitation Project is to assist the
            Kingdom of Cambodia to move forward in fulfilling the
            Millennium Development Goals (MDGs) in water supply and
            sanitation by 2015. The restructuring will: (a) close the
            provincial water supply component, and transfer the
            remaining available funds to support: (i) the scaling-up of
            the sanitation component (part A, being implemented by the
            non-governmental organization (NGO) 'Center for
            Development' (CfD); and (ii) additional investments to
            expand water supply in the Peri-urban water supply component
            (part B, implemented by the Phnom Penh Water Supply
            Authority (PPWSA), the PPWSA component); and (b) adjust the
            key performance indicators. This project paper also proposes
            to extend, for the second time, the credit closing date,
            from the current closing date of June 30, 2010 to June 30,
            2011, for a total extension of three years.
